question: 不同社交媒体平台的用户增长情况，2018 年 Facebook 用户增长 8%，Twitter 用户增长 12%，Instagram 用户增长 22%。用柱形图可视化
response: {"type":"column","data":[{"category":"Facebook","value":8},{"category":"Twitter","value":12},{"category":"Instagram","value":22}],"title":"不同社交媒体平台的用户增长情况","axisXTitle":"平台","axisYTitle":"用户增长率（%）"}
answer: {"type":"column","data":[{"category":"Facebook","value":8},{"category":"Twitter","value":12},{"category":"Instagram","value":22}],"title":"2018 年社交媒体用户增长","axisXTitle":"平台","axisYTitle":"增长率 (%)"}
reference: 柱形图 - Column Chart 使用示例
